```{r}
sample_text <- read_csv("sample_text.csv")
# annotate text at the word level
words <- annotate_text(sample_text$text)
# annotate text at the sentence level
sentences <- annotate_text(sample_text$text, level = "sentences")
# get future promises
promises <- extract_promises(sentences)
# extract subjects (needs updating for sentences)
subjects <- extract_subjects(words)
# get related terms to subjects
related_terms <- extract_related_terms(sample_text$text, subjects)
# code urgency
urgency <- get_urgency(sample_text$text)
head(urgency$sentence, n = 10)
# Does it makes sense? Are these more urgent promises?
```
